title: Quantum Maze Core Adventure #55
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Observation Deck
rooms.description: A sterile observation room overlooking the quantum reactor core through reinforced glass. Warning lights flash red, and alarm klaxons echo through the facility. Emergency protocols have sealed all exits. A control console blinks urgently, and research equipment is scattered across workstations.

items.name: emergency control console
items.description: A computer terminal displaying critical system warnings and locked compartments

items.name: evacuation protocol document
items.description: An emergency procedure document with critical information
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of quantum containment failure, all personnel must exit through the decontamination chamber. Lead Scientist Doctor Heisenberg established this facility in 1927. Access requires knowledge of: the founding year, the particle we study, and the lead scientist's name.

items.name: level 3 magnetic keycard
items.description: A security card with magnetic strip and quantum facility logo

items.name: research workstation
items.description: A desk covered with papers, quantum calculations, and lab equipment

items.name: quantum research notebook
items.description: A notebook filled with equations and experimental notes
items.text: Research Log: Our experiments focus on quantum entanglement and superposition. The particle we study most is the electron. Doctor Heisenberg leads our team. Today we achieved a breakthrough in quantum tunneling, but the containment field is unstable.

items.name: equipment storage locker
items.description: A metal locker containing safety equipment and tools

items.name: radiation detection badge
items.description: A badge that monitors radiation exposure levels

items.name: facility layout map
items.description: A schematic showing the layout of the quantum research facility
items.text: FACILITY MAP: Observation Deck connects to Laboratory Wing (south). Laboratory Wing connects to Quantum Core Chamber (east). Emergency exit through decontamination requires proper authorization.

items.name: reinforced lab door
items.description: A heavy security door leading to the laboratory wing, sealed by magnetic lock

rooms.name: Laboratory Wing
rooms.description: A long corridor lined with laboratory equipment, particle accelerator components, and quantum measurement devices. Screens display wave functions and probability distributions. The air hums with electromagnetic energy. Research stations line both walls, and a massive vault door dominates the eastern wall.

items.name: quantum particle detector
items.description: A sophisticated device for measuring quantum states
items.text: Detector Display: Currently detecting high-energy electron emissions from the quantum core. Warning: Containment field at 23% integrity.

items.name: research computer terminal
items.description: A workstation with multiple monitors showing quantum simulations
items.text: Terminal Log: Doctor Heisenberg's final entry - The quantum core is destabilizing. I've locked the vault with security questions only the research team can answer. The core must be stabilized or we must evacuate immediately.

items.name: research filing cabinet
items.description: A cabinet containing classified research documents

items.name: personnel records
items.description: Files containing information about facility staff
items.text: PERSONNEL FILE: Lead Scientist - Doctor Werner Heisenberg. Specialization: Quantum mechanics and uncertainty principle. Founded this facility to study electron behavior and quantum phenomena.

items.name: quantum mechanics paper
items.description: A published research paper on quantum theory
items.text: Abstract: This paper explores the fundamental nature of the electron and its wave-particle duality. Our research demonstrates that electrons exhibit both particle and wave properties, a cornerstone of quantum mechanics.

items.name: emergency safety cabinet
items.description: A red cabinet containing emergency equipment

items.name: protective hazmat gloves
items.description: Heavy-duty gloves for handling radioactive materials

items.name: quantum core vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door leading to the quantum core chamber. A security panel displays three authentication questions.

password_questions.question: What year was this facility founded?
password_questions.hint: Check the evacuation protocol document in the observation deck

password_questions.question: What particle do we study?
password_questions.hint: The research notebook and quantum theory paper mention this

password_questions.question: Who is the lead scientist?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents reference the facility leader

rooms.name: Quantum Core Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the facility! The quantum core pulses with brilliant blue light in the center of the chamber, contained within a spherical energy field. Holographic displays show stabilizing quantum states. An emergency decontamination exit glows green on the far wall, leading to safety. The core's energy readings are returning to normal.

items.name: quantum reactor core
items.description: A magnificent sphere of pure quantum energy, now stabilized and safely contained

items.name: core stabilization console
items.description: The main control system showing all quantum parameters returning to safe levels
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: Quantum core stabilized. Containment field at 100%. All safety protocols restored. Emergency evacuation route now accessible.

items.name: holographic status display
items.description: A 3D projection showing the quantum field in perfect harmony

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have navigated through the quantum facility, solved the security protocols, and reached the quantum core chamber. The containment field is stable, the crisis is averted, and the emergency exit is now open. You can evacuate safely with the knowledge that you've saved the facility from a catastrophic quantum breach. You win!
